---
name: Feature request
about: Suggest an improvement or new capability
title: "[Feature] "
labels: feature_request
assignees: ""
---

## Problem statement

What user problem are you trying to solve?

## Proposed change

Describe what you would like to change. Please keep proposals:
- defensive only
- explainable
- safe by default

## Safety impact

Could this change:
- affect kill switch behavior?
- change what data is collected/stored?
- increase privileges needed?

If yes, explain the risk and the intended mitigations.

## Threat-model justification

Which threat(s) does this address (e.g., cookie theft, wallet drainer behavior, stealth exfiltration)?

## Alternatives considered

What other approaches did you consider?
